name: Mr. block man
description:
Mr. block man is a simple yet addictive puzzle runner game.

Rotate shapes and match them to create a road without obstacles in clear line.

Collect Keys and unlock various characters with additional abilities. Each character has a unique ability in the game that provides new ways to play, compete, and earn your highest score yet!

Aim for a personal high score and then celebrate and brag as you fly past your friends on the game center leaderboard.

Easy to play and pleasurable game for all age. Rotate the blocks with simply tap on screen.

As u mastered game becomes more challenging.

HD graphics included which make the game very enjoyable on tablets !
